name: Chapuzas Paco
description:
Chapuzas Paco

You're Paco, and you do a little bit of everything: whether it's sewing, gluing, surgery or exorcism, you can make your way through it. Which is good, because you need all the help you can get in this economy!

Tools for the job

Sometimes you'll need glue, sometimes duct tape, and some other times the power of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ to ward off evil spirits. Whatever the case, your toolbox has the perfect tool for the job!

Scores

Sometimes a well-done job is its own reward, and other times, it's doing a well-done job faster than the competition! After all, the faster you go, the faster you get paid!

Credits

José Luis Amores: Music and SFX YouTube
